“mage dahama buddhiye agrapalayak se pahada denu manawi.
elesa ema tharunayan nopaminiye nam janithata miyayana thuru paharadimata ida thibini.
mehema karana ayath wenath awakashayanhidi thamange ananyathawa wenuwen peni sitinawa.

udaw balaporoththuwen ma langata paminena samata ma haki pamanin udaw karanawa.

ape nade ragath bas rathaya raththiri ata pamana weddi katharagama bas nawathumpole nawathwanawa mathakayi.
as walata amaruyine
ekekutawath hariyata katha kara gannawath ba.
godak sudu nowunath kamak naha"

jyeshta niyojya polispathi nandana munasinha mahatha wisin 2019-4-11 dina praharayan sambandhawa thorathuru athulathwa polispathiwarayage assanin yuthu lipiyak, ewaka jathika buddhi pradhaniyage praharaya gana danwime lipi kattalayak, buddhi anshaya wisin soyagath thorathuru athulu lipi 4 kin yuthu kattalayak thamata labunu bawath edinama thama eyata aawarana lipiyak sakasa adala pradhaninge upades matha kriyakarana lesath sakakaruwange chayarupa, ilakkagatha pradeshawala owun sitinawada ee aashritha kuli niwasa ha nawathan pariksha karana lesa thama in thamata pahala jyeshta polis adhikariwarunta 2019-4-12 dina lipi mangin danumdun bawath ee mahatha kiya.

shri lanka pasal krikat sangamaya meheyawana wayasa awurudu 15 n pahala dewani kotase tharaga thunaka di kolambaa tharstan widuhala kolambaa ashoka widyalaya saha maradana santha joshap widyala paradawa jayagrahana wartha kirimata kalaniya shri dharmaloka widyalaya samath wiya.kolambaa tharstan widuhala paradawa dharmaloka widyalaya kadulu dekaka thiyunu jayak wartha kala athara ashoka widuhala kadulu 7 kin da maradana santha joshap widyalaya kadulu 8kin da paradawa jaya ganimata dharmaloka kridakayo samath wuha.dharmaloka – tharstantharstan widuhala oowara 32.2 kadi siyalu dena dawi lakunu 97yi.
